ISSUE.TITLE: Problem on importing product with categories which has limitation to specific stores
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.10+ > Hi When I make an export of products in excel i get a format in the excel sheet., when I only change the price, then I save it under the same file and try to import the same file again. I get the error > > "Database doesn't contain the 'Dartpijlen >> Harrows Dartpijlen' category > > Which in fact really exist. see [this post ](https://www.nopcommerce.com/en/boards/topic/93329/import-export)for more details

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #6142 Fixed problem with running Down migrations during plugins uninstall process

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6134 Fixed problem on importing product with categories which has limitation to specific stores
